Name: HOSTLIGHT
About the game: Hostlight is a challenging single-player first-person puzzle game that will embark you on a mysterious adventure. Solve puzzles by using LIGHTS AND SHADOWS, and discover what lies ahead in an intriguing tower. o Use your brain to complete intriguing and challenging puzzles by using lights and shadows with innovative gameplay mechanics. o Create the pieces required to solve the puzzles through the use of projected shadows. o Lights and shadows can be projected by manipulating silhouettes that hit the player to obtain the necessary pieces. o Play around with the primary light colours (Red, Green, and Blue) to mix and match and complete puzzles. Only the white light creates objects! o Take advantage of the environment â€” Use mirrors to direct light beams and use rails. o To complete from one level to another you need to light up the platform in the middle of each room. o Play through over 20 levels , each designed to offer different puzzles and challenges.
